name: people-service
description: An example seneca-based micro-service for People (Person data).

scripts.typings-all: npm run typings-browser-angular2 && npm run typings-server && npm run typings-end-to-end-static && npm run typings-end-to-end-live
scripts.clean: rm -fr generated logs && npm run mkdirs
scripts.test-browser-angular2: npm run build-browser-angular2 && karma start components/browser-angular2/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.dev-browser-angular2: npm run build-browser-angular2 && concurrently "npm run watch-browser-angular2"  "lite-server -c components/browser-angular2/bs-config.json"  "karma start components/browser-angular2/karma.conf.js"
scripts.test-server: npm run build-server && npm run build-server-tests && NODE_PATH=.:generated/server   mocha -R spec generated//server/people-service.tests.js
scripts.build-end-to-end: npm run build-end-to-end-static && npm run build-end-to-end-live
scripts.test-end-to-end-static: npm run build-browser-angular2 && npm run build-end-to-end-static && concurrently "lite-server -c components/test-end-to-end/static/bs-config.json" "protractor components/test-end-to-end/static/protractor.config.js" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test-end-to-end-live: npm run build-browser-angular2 && npm run build-server && npm run build-end-to-end-live && npm run start-servers && protractor components/test-end-to-end/live/protractor.config.js && npm run stop-servers
scripts.test-end-to-end: npm run test-end-to-end-static && npm run test-end-to-end-live
scripts.build: npm run build-browser-angular2 && npm run build-server && npm run build-end-to-end
scripts.test: npm run test-browser-angular2 && npm run test-server && npm run test-end-to-end
scripts.# docker: npm run docker-build && docker run -it --rm -p 3000:3000 -p 3001:3001 ng2-quickstart
